title: Italy - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Required Documents
items: Two recent Photos must be in ICAO format (4.0 x 3.5 cm, color photo with white background, taken within the last 6 months).
Personal cover letter explaining the purpose of your visit and who will bear the travel cost.
Tour Plan lining out the entire intended itinerary/activities in the Schengen area.
Proof of financial means of the applicant in Bangladesh.
Documents if visiting family or friends residing in Italy.

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
